subject: Order made but not shipped
description_text:
Hello,

I placed an order #SSN2865 for over 48h ago, payment was confirmed but
until now, no shipping or news or any other communication.

Plus, I sent emails on 29 September and many after that and got no reply
(previously I got an offer from you for a 12% discount or more. After no
reply, I used a 10% discount offer I received from you in an automatic
email).

I'm getting concerned about my purchase and would like some information
regarding my order.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

conversations.body_text: Hi Joao Oliveira,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Our Plus X P2-H2 is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We'll ship your order once the warehouse restocks in a couple of days. Thank you for your support and patience!
